venue.name: The Healing Center at Our Weeping Angel Foundation

item.description:
Celebrate this world-wide event with Kathryn McGlynn, Certified Hypnotist. 

Visit for more information:
http://www.worldhypnotismday.com/2012-events/world-hypnotism-day-january-4-2012-bostonsouth-shore-free-stress-management-seminar-700pm/

Tonight, enjoy a relaxing group hypnosis session and learn several very simple stress management tips. Bring a pillow, mat and blanket, if desired.  

Door prizes and free hypnosis gifts offered. Bring your friends!

Seating is limited. Preregistration required.

Donations accepted. 

100% of proceeds donated to Our Weeping Angel Foundation, a non-profit foundation that helps people gain access to holistic healthcare.

group.name: Past Life Regression & Professional Hypnosis Group

item.name: World Hypnotism Day - FREE Hypnosis Event
